titleStmt.title: An astronomical description of the late comet or blazing star as it appeared in New-England in the 9th, 10th, 11th, and in the beginning of the 12th moneth, 1664 : together with a brief theological application thereof / by S.D.
titleStmt.author: Danforth, Samuel, 1626-1674.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
